request.description: Requests a new access token and adds it to the environment variables

exec: tests["Response time is less than 200ms"] = responseTime < 200;

exec: tests["Response time is less than 200ms"] = responseTime < 200;
tests["Response time is less than 1000ms"] = responseTime < 1000;
tests["Entity ID is populated"] = jsonData.ID && jsonData.ID > 0;
tests["Entity Name is populated"] = jsonData.Name && jsonData.Name !== "";
tests["Entity Type is populated"] = jsonData.Type && jsonData.Type > 0;
tests["Response time is less than 200ms"] = responseTime < 200;
tests["Entity ID is correct"] = jsonData.ID.toString() === environment["entity-id"];
tests["Entity Name is populated"] = jsonData.Name && jsonData.Name !== "";
tests["Entity Type is populated"] = jsonData.Type && jsonData.Type > 0;
tests["Response time is less than 200ms"] = responseTime < 200;
tests["Response time is less than 200ms"] = responseTime < 200;
